nl.strohalm.cyclos.services.permissions

Interface PermissionServiceLocal

  • All Superinterfaces:
    PermissionService, Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PermissionServiceImpl

    public interface PermissionServiceLocal
extends PermissionService
    Local interface. It must be used only from other services.
